## About This Path: External

```HarvestDayCalendar/External``` includes interface/class by other creators for the purpose of integrating the Harvest Calendar program with other mods. 

All files are taken with permission. 

Currently, this path contains:


| File                        | Mod                     | Creator     |
|-----------------------------|-------------------------|-------------|
| [IGenericModConfigMenuApi.cs](IGenericModConfigMenuApi.cs) | [Generic Mod Config Menu](https://www.nexusmods.com/stardewvalley/mods/5098) | [spacechase0](https://github.com/spacechase0) |
